name: 0-event-trace
title: Lua API Event Trace
author: x2605
description:
This is a debugging tool. This mod tracks and shows you what event ID(defines.events.ï½ž) occurs. Only admins can open GUI if it is multiplay game.

How to use :
Press SHIFT+F3 to open GUI. (you can change key bindings)
Press SHIFT+F2 for quick toggle logging mode while GUI is opened.
Only works while GUI is opened.

Visit lua-api.factorio.com to see full description of events.
